SELECT ts.`name` AS singerName, tm.id AS musicId, tm.musicName, tm.resume, tm.compose FROM t_singer ts LEFT JOIN t_music_connect_singer tmcs ON ts.id = tmcs.singerId LEFT JOIN t_music tm ON tmcs.musicId = tm.id
AND tmcs.singerId = #{singerId}
